GSD.description:
btrfs: qgroup: fix sleep from invalid context bug in btrfs_qgroup_inherit()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v4.19.268 by commit f4b930a1602b05e77fee31f9616599b25e910a86. For more details please see the references link.
